sentences.en: China has 267 million families and every year about 10 million newlywed couples join their ranks.
sentences.cn: 中国现有2.67亿个家庭,每年约有1000万对新婚夫妇组成新家庭.

sentences.en: Lavalais raised his glass to propose a toast to the newlyweds.
sentences.cn: 拉瓦莱斯举起了他的酒杯，向这对新婚夫妇敬酒。

sentences.en: My newlywed wife and I are deeply in love.
sentences.cn: 我和我的新婚妻子彼此深爱着对方。

sentences.en: The newlywed person accept bless from the eldership in the family.
sentences.cn: 新人接受家族长辈们的祝福.

sentences.en: Yesterday, media reporters interviewed the newlywed.
sentences.cn: 昨日, 媒体记者采访了这对新婚燕尔.

trans.tran_en: Newlyweds are a man and woman who have very recently got married to each other
